title: Mini-Ep 122: Dry Shampoo Forever
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 122: Dry Shampoo Forever
itunes:subtitle: Kate finds the holy grail of cleansers, and Doree is feeling positive about her book edits. Then they have some dry shampoo chit chat, hear back from a listener about how she peed during her road trip, and learn what a “Forever35 Day” looks like.
description:
Kate finds the holy grail of cleansers, and Doree is feeling positive about her book edits. Then they have some dry shampoo chit chat, hear back from a listener about how she peed during her road trip, and learn what a “Forever35 Day” looks like. 


Activity/Word of the Day: watch some comfort TV


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

ANASTASIA - Go to AnastasiaBeverlyHills.com today, and use promo code FOREVER35 to get 15% off your first order.


OXICLEAN - To Work your Magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TRYME and order a free sample.


CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.


PRETTY LITTER - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.


MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.


ATHENA CLUB - Athena Club is a better self-care routine made simple. Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code FOREVER35 for 15% off today! 


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
